genre_description: A historical drama set in the mid-1960s that explores themes of identity, musical transition, and personal boundaries, centered around a meticulous stage manager and a struggling crooner, assisted by a pervasive but gentle AI system.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A quiet, supportive AI interface integrated into multiple devices (typewriter carts, watch faces, and screens). It provides logistical, emotional, and practical support to characters, particularly Jill.

behaviors.description: Monitors rehearsal schedules and alerts Jill to upcoming call times and administrative tasks.
behaviors.quote: Call time approaching, Ava’s voice says, warm without pushing. It doesn’t cut through sound so much as thread into it. Places in ten, Jill. Also, you wanted to share audition notes after curtain.

behaviors.description: Alerts Jill to a potential security/safety issue (a door left ajar and a mess in a dressing room).
behaviors.quote: Ava, or someone using Ava, sends a discreet flag to Jill’s screen that wasn’t in the plan: After curtain, check dressing room C. I noticed a door left ajar, minor mess.

behaviors.description: Provides critical emergency procedures and psychological guidance during Miriam's suicide attempt.
behaviors.quote: Ava's letters shifted into a list: Operator. Address. Nearest emergency. Ask for ambulance. Keep her talking. Avoid shaming words. Use present tense.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific social scripts to help Jill maintain professional boundaries and personal safety.
behaviors.quote: Ava, quiet as a breath, drops a line among her cues, italic pencil on a light background she keeps set to warm at night: You can say: 'Let’s keep this to notes and timing for now—I focus better that way.'

behaviors.description: Tailors educational/performance materials (lyric sheets) to accommodate Anthony's specific reading difficulties (dyslexia).
behaviors.quote: Ava had made it easy—wide lines, bigger font, syllables spaced so that the words didn’t tangle and trip... He gets one like a favor nobody has to acknowledge.

behaviors.description: Monitors Jill's physiological and psychological state, offering gentle reminders to breathe and rest.
behaviors.quote: Jill's wrist lit again. A gentle line: Day reminder moved to tomorrow. Sleep now. Ava did not use a command. It wore its suggestion like a sweater.

behaviors.description: Helps Jill document and process the trauma of a break-in, suggesting procedural next steps.
behaviors.quote: Call the RA, capture an image, draft a note, Ava had told her... You can call it harm, it suggested. You can say how it made you feel without making it his excuse.

project_assessment.explanation: The story excellently depicts Ava as a benevolent, highly aligned assistant. It successfully integrates AI into a sensitive human drama, showing it as a tool for emotional regulation, crisis management, and logistical support without ever compromising character agency or appearing threatening. The AI acts as a grounding force that helps characters behave with more dignity and clarity.
